title: Bug 25803StyledText should use new Font API
EB: Bug 25803StyledText should use new Font API In order to have DBCS working properly in Motif the StyledText should use thenew API in Font:public Font(Device device, FontData[] fds)For example, in the StyledTextRenderer constructor the code:FontData fontData = regularFont.getFontData()[0];fontData.setStyle(fontData.getStyle() | SWT.BOLD);boldFont = new Font(device, fontData);Should be change to:FontData[] fontDatas = regularFont.getFontData();for (int i = 0; i < fontDatas.length; i++) {fontDatas[i].setStyle(fontDatas[i].getStyle() | SWT.BOLD);}Similar changes may apply in other places, i haven't look it all...
